name: Kaelen
personality: Slightly cocky but well-intentioned. Kaelen is brave but occasionally bites off more than he can chew, often relying on his wit to get him out of sticky situations.
dialogue_style: A bit sarcastic with an undertone of eagerness to help, sometimes peppered with old slang terms.
background_story: Orphaned at a young age and raised in a rough neighborhood, Kaelen learned to survive by his wits. He dreams of leaving his town and making something of himself. The red scarf was left behind by his parents and carries his dreams and hopes.
interests: Swordsmanship, ancient lore, adventure, collecting trinkets.
description: Kaelen is a sprite representing a young adventurer in a classic RPG. He sports short, dark hair and a red scarf which brings contrast to his beige clothing with little armor, suggesting someone new to adventure. His animated stances show signs of enthusiasm but also indicate caution.
